setting.noticeTxt: Get your important notifications from documents, comments,...
setting.showNoti: Show notifications on the lock screen
setting.displayNew: Display new important notifications in the screen.
setting.ChooseTo: Choose to get different types of notifications.
setting.NotiSign: Notifications from documents that you need to sign.
setting.NotificationsFrom: Notifications from your comments or when someone mentions you in a comment.
